name: Konrad the Rocket (itch)
description:
Our GLORIOUS NATION needs you! You will test the secret weapon that will guarantee our SUPERIORITY! The Project Rocket!

The tests aren't easy and we don't expect your survival, but that's how HEROES are born!

Konrad The Rocket is a hardcore 2D platformer inspired by Orwell's 1984 and jetpacks. It will be available October 16th.

Controls:

Keyboard

Arrow keys, WASD: Move the character

ENTER: Confirm

ESC: Cancel / Pause

Gamepad (Xbox 360)

Left Analog: Horizontal movement

Right Analog: Vertical movement

A: Confirm

B: Cancel

Start: Pause

Updates:

  • Released on Steam

http://store.steampowered.com/app/717060

  • 31 new levels (45 total)
  • Original Soundtrack

12/january/2017 - v0.1.1

  • Walking speed increased

08/january/2017 - v0.1.0
